title: Trend Follow with HTF Alignment
objective: Trade in the direction of the daily trend when hourly aligns.
entry_logic: daily_ema up AND hourly close > ema20 AND ema_slope > 0
exit_logic: trail stop via ATR; exit on EMA cross down or target
caveats: Late reversals after long trends; watch for HTF shifts.
beginner_summary: Go with the daily trend only when the hourly agrees.
assistant_hints: Require hourly EMA alignment and positive slope.
